simplified: 在家千日好，出门一时难
traditional: 在家千日好，出門一時難
pinyin: zai4 jia1 qian1 ri4 hao3 , chu1 men2 yi1 shi2 nan2

definitions.zai4 jia1 qian1 ri4 hao3 , chu1 men2 yi1: lit. at home, one can spend a thousand days in comfort, but spending a day away from home can be challenging (idiom); fig. there's no place like home;
